### Government Tender Announcement: Request for Proposal (RFP)
#### Synopsis
This Request for Proposal (RFP) is issued by the Department of National Defence and seeks to engage the services of a Level 3 Financial Specialist as part of the Task and Solutions Professional Services (TSPS) framework. 

#### Key Details

* **RFP Dataset**: PW-22-01013857
* **Proposal Closing Date**: December 1, 2022 at 2:00 PM EST
* **Tender Category**: Human Resources Services, Business Consulting/Change Management, and Project Management Services
* **Security Requirement**: Government of Canada Security Level, Facility Security Clearance (FSC), and Reliability Status

#### Description of the Requirement
The objective of this contract is to obtain third-party expertise to assess the Supporting Accounts and their interrelationships with departmental capacity constraints and the ability to execute the National Public Procurement (NPP) program. 

#### Eligibility Criteria
This RFP is open exclusively to Supply Arrangement Holders (SA Holders) who have qualified under Tier 1 in the following category: One (1) Level 3 - 3.8 Financial Specialist.

#### Documents and Submissions
RFP documents will be emailed directly to Qualified SA Holders who are invited to bid on this requirement. Bidders are advised to note that RFP documents are not available on the Government Electronic Tendering System (GC Buy and Sell).

#### Contact Information
For more information and document requests, please contact:
Name: Macqueen, Fraser
Email: fraser.macqueen@forces.gc.ca
Phone: 902-580-9042

#### Important Notes
* The TSPS Method of Supply is subject to quarterly refresh cycles.
* Interested firms can learn more about qualifying as a Qualified SA Holder by contacting SPTS.TSPS@TPSGC-PWGSC.GC.CA. 

#### Trade Agreements
This RFP is subject to the comprehensive and progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), and other applicable trade agreements. 

#### Regions of Opportunity and Delivery
This RFP is open globally and delivery will be made in the National Capital Region (NCR). [Note: Check the actual text for any changed regions]
